Oliot ONS (Object Name Service)

Object Name Service (ONS) is service look-up system on top of Directory Naming Service (DNS). It is located in higher layer of EPC global architecture [http://www.gs1.org/epcglobal]. Briefly, this service have a responsibility of looking up services related to given Electronic Product Code (EPC).

It should be noted that ONS fully leverages DNS. As a service publisher, you need to add/delete/update service lists related to give EPC as a NAPTR Record form [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2915.txt], leading clients to obtain them by ordinary DNS query (e.g. Java JNDI.

For more information, please refer to ONS 2.0.1 specification
